name: Spreo26
body:
#LANGUAGES AND TECHNOLOGIES


Proficient: Ruby, Rails, ActiveRecord, JavaScript, CoffeeScript, jQuery, AngularJS, AJAX, SQL, PostgreSQL, Git, GitHub, RSpec, HTML5, Haml, CSS3, Sass, MATLAB

Exposure: Python, D3.js, Google Analytics, Capybara, FactoryGirl, LabVIEW, C, C++, Java, Perl

# Projects

## Compose-pad | [live](http://compose-pad.herokuapp.com/) | [code](https://github.com/SPreo26/compose-pad) | 2015 - 2016

- MIDI music note sequencer for musically inclined individuals to quickly and easily write, play and save their own tunes.
- Utilizes Ruby on Rails, PostgreSQL, AngularJS, D3.JS, Bootstrap, Bootstrap UI (Angular module).
- Incorporates MIDI.js library to play user songs.
- Multiple song files can be open in tabs.

## Acoustic Speech Recognition System | [live](https://drive.google.com/open?id=0Bxvz4oBLx9gZdUFpMEtySzZqQXc) 2011 - 2012

- Noise cancelling algorithm optimizations for use with an intelligent speech dialog kiosk located in a high decibel venue.
- Wrote MATLAB and Perl code to automate testing different parameters saving considerable time in research.
- Improved speech recognition rate by 70%+ through engineering noise cancelling algorithm in MATLAB using linear algebra techniques on input data from an array of microphones.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
